recipesJson.name: PILLOW TALK
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
MIX AT 70VG///30PG
STEEP: MEDIUM - 4-5 DAYS

A VANILLA MINT PERFECT FOR AFTER A MEAL, A HOT SUNDAY MORNING, OR TO FRESHEN UP.

reviews.text: i think it would be better without peppermint

I like the flavor a lot and this was an ADV for me when waiting for other recipes to steep, but it comes off as very dry on my pallet. Not harsh, just really, really dry. I would like to see a version of this that has a slightly wetter mouthfeel if that makes any sense. I'm pretty new to DIY so I have no real idea of how I could make that happen

Great for 5 minutes, gets boring after that. Not much going on, it really is just a vanilla mint. An interesting profile, feels like it could be made with bolder-sharper flavors but i don't know how much better a vanilla mint can get.
very Tasty, sorry I've got no criticisms as it is great as is
Tastes just like a dinner mint! Great for those times when you have vape tounge. I like to pair this with morning coffee and after brushing my teeth :)
Lovely vanilla mint. Will mix again!
